casebody.data:
Arthur VANMOOR, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SONOCO PRODUCTS COMPANY, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 02-1382. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 10, 2003.

Before CLEVENGER, RADER, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
